name: Vassal_One_(Whetstone)
content:
A Kilji male known as "Vassal One" served the Kilji Illumine, the government of the Kilji species, as a Kilji vassal and followed the Illumine's religious beliefs. Around 18 BBY, he served aboard the Kilji war cruiser Whetstone under the Illumine's leader, Generalirius Nakirre. During Nakirre's alliance with the Grysk operative Jixtus and the Whetstone's stay at the Unknown Regions Zyzek system, Vassal One informed the generalirius that the Chiss heavy cruiser Springhawk arrived.
Shortly after, Nakirre's cruiser left after meeting Chiss Senior Captain Thrawn above the planet Zyzek, and the Kilji vassal was told by Nakirre to get the Whetstone to a star system in 10 minutes where Jixtus would answer all of the generalirius' questions. There, Nakirre argued with Jixtus and agreed to follow every command Jixtus gave, and Vassal One was ordered to get them to the Chiss world of Ornfra. Soon after, the Grysk said they were going to the planet Sunrise, and Nakirre said Vassal One would get them there, however, Jixtus objected and ordered navigator Qilori to do so instead.
Vassal One appeared in the 2021 novel Thrawn Ascendancy: Lesser Evil, the final volume in the Star Wars: The Ascendancy Trilogy written by Timothy Zahn.
